name: treatment of used cable | copper, cathode | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8060/documentation

The multioutput-process 'mechanical separation of copper containing cables' delivers the co-products 'disposal, treatment of cables‚Äù and 'copper, from cable treatment, in secondary production, at plant'. The allocation is done 100% to the disposal process.

This dataset represents the treatment of waste cable from electric and electronic devices. It includes infrastructure, energy consumption, and an estimation of the efforts for transportation. The process has no emissions to air / water.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from a European cable recycling company - used as global average data.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Shredder, followed by a modern grinding machine with current separation technology

flow.name: copper, cathode
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals
